text: The men's 4x100 metres relay event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 20 and 21 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ashton Collins Wes Felix Ivory Williams Willie Hordge ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Winston Hutton Orion Nicely Yhann Plummer Usain Bolt ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Chevon Simpson Marc Burns Kevon Holder Darrel Brown ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
